SEARCH
Module Assignment
Package interfaces

Interface ISuggestionSenderService

All Known Implementing Classes:
SuggestionSenderService
public interface ISuggestionSenderService
The ISuggestionSenderService interface defines methods for managing suggestions sent by a student.

  • Method Details

    • getDraftSuggestion

      Map<Integer,Suggestion> getDraftSuggestion(String studentID)
      Retrieves draft suggestions submitted by a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a Map of Suggestion objects representing draft suggestions with their IDs as keys

    • getSubmittedSuggestion

      Retrieves submitted suggestions by a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a Map of Suggestion objects representing submitted suggestions with their IDs as keys

      Map<Integer,Suggestion> getAcceptedSuggestion(String studentID)
      Retrieves accepted suggestions by a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a Map of Suggestion objects representing accepted suggestions with their IDs as keys

    • getRejectedSuggestion

      Map<Integer,Suggestion> getRejectedSuggestion(String studentID)
      Retrieves rejected suggestions by a student.
      Parameters:
      studentID - the ID of the student
      Returns:
      a Map of Suggestion objects representing rejected suggestions with their IDs as keys

    • submitSuggestion

      int submitSuggestion(String senderID, String campName, String suggestionDetails, boolean isDraft)
      Submits a suggestion.
      Parameters:
      senderID - the ID of the student submitting the suggestion
      campName - the name of the camp related to the suggestion
      suggestionDetails - the details of the suggestion
      isDraft - true if the suggestion is a draft, false otherwise
      Returns:
      the ID of the submitted suggestion

    • editSuggestion

      boolean editSuggestion(int suggestionID, String senderID, String newDetails, boolean isDraft)
      Edits a draft suggestion.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - the ID of the suggestion to be edited
      senderID - the ID of the student editing the suggestion
      newDetails - the updated details of the suggestion
      isDraft - true if the suggestion remains a draft, false otherwise
      Returns:
      true if the suggestion is edited successfully, false otherwise

    • deleteDraftSuggestion

      boolean deleteDraftSuggestion(int suggestionID, String senderID)
      Deletes a draft suggestion.
      Parameters:
      suggestionID - the ID of the draft suggestion to be deleted
      senderID - the ID of the student deleting the draft suggestion
      Returns:
      true if the draft suggestion is deleted successfully, false otherwise
